characterDescription:
Durk is an influence from Kaladin's past. He was a man who cared only for his own skin.
Still, it remains unknown just when Durk and Kaladin met. However, at some point before Kaladin was enslaved, Durk told Kaladin that he was a natural born soldier and an artist with the spear.

characterDetails.Character: Durk is a fairly superstitious man; he wears a pair of 'lucky boots' into every battle.
